testsuite.name: scripts.TC002
testsuite.system-out: Login, navigate to calendar and select new booking Enter booking Start time (19:00) and Finish time (19:15) Enter booking title(Automation Test) and number of delegate(1) Click on Contact Avatar to open Enter first name and last name in the search text box then click search btn Double click to select contact Open invoice, add invoice address and save Open costs, enter Room cost (£10:00),Equipment cost (£5:00) and save Open catering, add catering item and save Open Sponsors, add details, costs, save and then close Select education centre under department and interview under category Tick No Equipment Required Save and then logout
